t: Amazon.com: Zapopan: CDs & Vinyl
s: Zapopan is one of 57 (re)mastered albums that form the musical oeuvre of Omar Rodríguez-López. All albums are released in collaboration with Clouds Hill - some as re-releases, some are available on vinyl for the very first time now.

Omar Rodríguez-López announces boxset with 57 albums, Amor De Frances | The Line of Best Fit
s: October 30, 2023 - Puerto Rican guitarist and songwriter Omar Rodríguez-López – who has worked with The Mars Volta and At-The Drive In – has announced that his complete solo works from 2004-2024 will now be released as a vinyl box set, which contains 57 albums.
